amendment.description: Amendment repeals the District's Health Care Benefits Expansion Act which permits unmarried cohabiting adults to register with the District and receive certain health and other legal benefits.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 4 in the Congressional Record of October 30, 1995, to repeal the District of Columbia's Health Care Benefits Expansion Act, relating to health care for domestic partners.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hostettler amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 249 - 172, 1 Present (Roll no. 759).
